Title: Relates to revising the period of authorization for the county of Westchester's additional one percent rate of sales and compensating use tax and the expiration of the Westchester county spending limitation act
Summary: Relates to revising the period of authorization for the county of Westchester's additional one percent rate of sales and compensating use tax and the expiration of the Westchester county spending limitation act, such 1% increase shall expire on November 30, 2020.
LawCode: Amd §1210, Tax L; amd §§4, 5, 7 & 16, Chap 272 of 1991; add §6-a, Chap of 2019 (as proposed in S.4940-B and A.7081)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to revising the period of authorization for the county of Westchester's additional one percent rate of sales and compensating use tax and the expiration of the Westchester county spending limitation act; to amend chapter 272 of the laws of 1991, amending the tax law relating to the method of disposition of sales and compensating use tax revenue in Westchester county and enacting the Westchester county spending limitation act, in relation to revising the period of authorization for the county of Westchester's additional one percent rate of sales; and to amend a chapter of the laws of 2019, amending the tax law relating to authorizing the county of Westchester to impose an additional rate of sales and compensating use tax, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S.4940-B and A.7081, in relation to the period of authorization for Westchester's additional one percent rate of sales
